sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一条横贯南极洲的山脉，从东到西将南极洲分为两半。

sentences.english: The climber traversed a long horizontal crack in the face of the mountain slope.
sentences.chinese: 登山者横贯了山脉斜坡表面一段长的水平裂缝。

sentences.english: River flows from north-east across the area to the southwest, rolling 50 Wa Lane.
sentences.chinese: 流溪河从该区东北部横贯至西南部，连绵50华里。

sentences.english: Hadrian's Wall is built across Britannia to keep out the barbarians .
sentences.chinese: 横贯大不列颠的哈德连长城被修筑用来防御野蛮人。

sentences.english: So you can imagine what the gas bill would be on a transcontinental flight.
sentences.chinese: 所以你也能想象得出横贯大陆的航线需要多少汽油钱。

sentences.english: Mr GuoWei river from east to west across the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 奥果韦河自东向西横贯全境。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans?CAntarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一条横贯南极洲的山脉，从东到西将南极洲分为两半。
以横贯加拿大的1号公路南。

sentences.english: It is advisable to take the trans-Atlantic liner.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐横贯大西洋的班船比较合适。

sentences.english: The start of the Central Cross-Island Highway.
Aurora Borealis in the distance on this beautiful night over Europe.
sentences.chinese: 在这个美丽的夜晚，横贯整个欧洲上空的极光。

sentences.english: Because of the Tropic of Cancer and the Trans-Ba Bao Tong had opened up to astronomical Park.
sentences.chinese: 因北回归线横贯八宝塘而过，开辟为天文公园。

sentences.english: The Ghan's revival on the north-south transcontinental line has been even more remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 横贯大洲南北的甘线铁路的复兴更意义非凡。

sentences.english: A hill bridges the town from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 一座山从东向西横贯全镇。

sentences.english: "the harmony" is one has existed since ancient times, thing yawing development idea.
sentences.chinese: “和谐”是一个古已有之，东西横贯的发展理念。

sentences.english: I crossed the continent and joined together the seas with my great railroads .
sentences.chinese: 我们修通了横贯北美大陆连接东西海岸的铁路干线。
